attributes.action: super fast fibre optic broadband for everyone in uk
attributes.additional_details: I would like the goverment to give every home in the uk fibre optic broadband some already have it some will have to wait up to 4 years or longer so why the guy down the road has it I might have to wait up to five years as BT are not doing it one city at a time there just randomley selecting exchanges arround the uk which means one could be done tom orroe but the one up the road in 5 years time whoch means the people down the road get super fast broadband and the people up the road have to wait years longer no one should have to wait years the goverment need to invest in in now and make sure everyone gets fire optic broadband thos year and not in 5 or even 10 years time and it should be done a whole city at a time not just one part of a city and the rest in a few years later
